definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Feed is manually provided by cranking the handle of the compound rest.
sentences.chinese: 通過搖動複式刀架操縱柄手動提供進給。

sentences.english: When their flags and banners move about chaotically , they can be attacked.
sentences.chinese: 旗幟混亂搖動，顯得舉起不定，可以攻擊。

sentences.english: 7For the king trusts in the Lord ; through the unfailing love of the Most High he will not be shaken.
sentences.chinese: 王依靠耶和華，因至高者的慈愛必不搖動。

sentences.english: An electronic receiver designed to pick up seismic vibrations.
sentences.chinese: 因地震的震動力而搖動。

sentences.english: 1A woman walks up to a little old man rocking in a chair on his porch.
sentences.chinese: 1一位女士走向坐在門廊的椅子上搖動的小老頭。

sentences.english: The pool rippling was caused by the waving of the reeds.
sentences.chinese: 池塘裏的潺潺聲是蘆葦搖動時引起的。

sentences.english: Now Mr. Jones is convulsing, sobbing uncontrollably.
sentences.chinese: 現在瓊斯先生正在搖動，無法控制地哭泣。

sentences.english: The soft breeze stirs the leaves.
sentences.chinese: 柔和的微風搖動着樹葉。

sentences.english: Risk of explosion by shock, friction, fire or other sources of ignition.
sentences.chinese: 遇火或點火，搖動，磨擦會發生爆炸。

sentences.english: Shake the jug as you pour the milk on top of the espresso to make surethe froth comes out.
sentences.chinese: 搖動奶壺，製造許多小泡泡，然後倒入咖啡中。

sentences.english: Ms. Tison gently swirls the teapot while the tea is steeping to make sure she mixes all the tea with the water.
sentences.chinese: 蒂松輕輕地搖動茶壺，使茶葉在熱水中充分浸泡。

sentences.english: Swirling brings out the green pepper notes typical of Cabernet Sauvignon.
sentences.chinese: 搖動酒體，散發出加本力蘇維翁特有的青辣椒芬芳。

sentences.english: The only time my dog's tail stops wagging is when she's asleep.
sentences.chinese: 我的狗只有在她睡覺的時候尾巴纔會停止搖動。

sentences.english: Don’t wobble the desk when I’m writing.
sentences.chinese: 我寫字時你不要搖動桌子。

sentences.english: She ran to the door and shook the handle impotently .
sentences.chinese: 他跑向門，無力地搖動門把手。

definition: to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
to flip over/to turn (a page)/to scroll (an electronic document)/to stir (food in a pot etc)/to move things about/to rummage
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to stir/to prod/to poke/to move sideways/to strum (on a guitar etc)
to move as in a dance/to wave (some implement)/to flourish/(of eyes, hands etc) to dance/to flutter
to float/to hover/also written 漂浮
to spiral/to circle/to go around/to hover/to orbit
to chat with a low voice
